greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Moebius(2n).
comment: b(n) = -a(n) is multiplicative with b(2^e) = 0, b(p) = -1 if p >= 3, 0 otherwise. - _David W. Wilson_, Jun 12 2005
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = mu(2n) = A008683(2n). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 17 2013
maple: with(numtheory); A099991:=n->mobius(2*n); seq(A099991(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 17 2013
mathematica: lst={};Do[AppendTo[lst, MoebiusMu[n]], {n, 0, 6!, 2}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 20 2008 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 20 2004
